floatLogs.PARAMETERS_UPDATED: The float variables have been changed
floatLogs.BALANCE_MISMATCH: Float bank balance and system balance do not match
floatLogs.ALLOCATION_TOTAL_MISMATCH: Part of the float (R{unallocatedAmount}) is not allocated
floatLogs.BALANCE_UNOBTAINABLE: System error: something is wrong, the current balance cannot be retrieved
floatLogs.BALANCE_UPDATED_MANUALLY: Float balance has been adjusted by admin
